ygData.subject: Re: From eq.stratics.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought I would let you know that after reading the following post yesterday, I decided to go hunt Meldrath.  Well, after 7 hours, with a spawn rate of 5
ygData.messageBody:
I thought I would let you know that after reading the following post
yesterday, I decided to go hunt Meldrath. Well, after 7 hours, with a spawn
rate of 5 minutes, I didn't see the third book. I can safely assume that if
you kill Meldrath 84 times and you don't get the book that it doesn't exist.
Oh well. It was the best rumor I had heard in awhile. Now if I can just
get the friends that helped me to stop laughing at me :)

Wandatin Dai'Noga
39th level Enchanter on Karana
>
> jbuckingham@... wrote:
>
> > Not gonna spoil it for ye all though, ye gotta kill Meldrath for the
recipes.
> >
> >
> > "
> >
> > Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for
the new
> > ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
> > So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become
apparent,
> > as all those rangers go gunning for him :)
>
> --Eron
> aeron@...
